articles.author: ROHIT BRIJNATH
articles.title: Sporting Life: China's Su Bingtian gives planet a taste of Asian speed - The Straits Times
articles.description: So crazy it is to feel, at least for a brilliant, beautiful while, that a 100m Olympic champion, or medallist, can come from Asia, says Rohit Brijnath.. Read more at straitstimes.com.

articles.title: COVID-19 surge hits Asia: Tokyo, Thailand, Malaysia set record infections - CGTN
articles.description: The Olympics host city Tokyo, as well as Thailand and Malaysia, announced record COVID-19 infections on Saturday, mostly driven by the highly transmissible Delta variant of the disease.
articles.content: People queue at the Central Vaccination Center as Thailand begins offering first doses of the AstraZeneca vaccine to at-risk groups amid COVID-19 outbreak in Bangkok, Thailand, July 26, 2021. /Reuter… [+3038 chars]

articles.title: Cambodia to mix vaccines as booster shots to fight COVID - The Star Online
articles.description: PHNOM PENH (Reuters) -     Cambodia will begin offering a booster shot against Covid-19, switching between the AstraZeneca and Chinese COVID-19 vaccines  in an effort to fight the spread of the coronavirus in the Southeast Asian country.

articles.description: Tokyo, Thailand and Malaysia have reported a massive spike in Covid-19 cases.
